name: Gallowgrove
description:
Mischievous thieves have disturbed Yorick’s Tomb and now the fell spirits of the damned rise from their coffins to haunt the unhallowed grounds of Gallowgrove. You play as a humble gravedigger, bent on returning his undead flock to their peaceful rest. Use your Dark Sight to navigate a world between life and death, reach Yorick’s Tomb, and bury all who cross your path. 

Alex Chheng - Programming / Level Design

Willow Jay Bryar - Narrative / Art & Animation / Level Design

Edwin Ayala - Level Design

Mekhi Vaughn - Level Design
